tweet.html: RT @StateDeptDSS: WATCH: Terrorist attacks lead to the 1986 Omnibus Diplomatic Security & Antiterrorism Act, formally creating DSS on 8/27/1986. #TBT pic.twitter.com/O1J6irc3uC
